prefLabel.fr: nombre total de salles de bain

definition.en: The total integer number of bathrooms in a some [[Accommodation]], following real estate conventions as [documented in RESO](https://ddwiki.reso.org/display/DDW17/BathroomsTotalInteger+Field): “The simple sum of the number of bathrooms. For example for a property with two Full Bathrooms and one Half Bathroom, the Bathrooms Total Integer will be 3.”. See also [[numberOfRooms]].

For example for a property with two Full Bathrooms and one Half Bathroom, the Bathrooms Total Integer will be 3.”. See also [[numberOfRooms]].
